applications.title: Applications
applications.name: Name
applications.first_steps_info:
The first step in using face recognition service is to create an application. An application is where you can
 create and manage models.

delete_dialog.title: Delete application
delete_dialog.warn_information: and all related data will be deleted

models.title: Models
models.name: Name
models.create_model_info:
Create the first model, where you will be able to add, recognize, delete faces,
      get list of the model faces, train the model and remove already trained.

delete_dialog.title: Delete model
delete_dialog.warn_information: and all related data will be deleted.

delete_dialog.title: Delete user
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want remove user {{name}} {{lastName}}?
delete_dialog.warn_information: The user {{firstName}} {{lastName}} is OWNER of applications:
delete_dialog.warn_hint_owner: In this case you will become the OWNER of these applications.
delete_dialog.warn_hint_new_owner: In this case the owner of this applications will be:
delete_dialog.default_confirmation:
{{type}} {{name}} and all related data will be deleted.
Are you sure?

org_users.add_users_info: You can add other users to the FRS application. They need to register and login to FRS. After registration and login users will appear automatically in the users' table.

app_users.add_users_info:
A user should be invited from the Default organization to appear in the list of users.
* Default organization Owner and Administrators already have access to any application without invite.

delete_dialog.title: Delete user
delete_dialog.confirmation_question: Are you sure you want remove user {{name}} from {{application}}?
